metadata.name: BITS Transfer Job Download From File Sharing Domains
metadata.comment: Detects BITS transfer job downloading files from a file sharing domain.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 16403 AND (contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.githubusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('anonfiles.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('cdn.discordapp.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('ddns.net')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('dl.dropboxusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('ghostbin.co')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('glitch.me')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('gofile.io')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('hastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('mediafire.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('mega.nz')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('onrender.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('pages.dev')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('paste.ee')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('pastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('pastebin.pl')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('pastetext.net')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('pixeldrain.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('privatlab.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('privatlab.net')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('send.exploit.in')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('sendspace.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('storage.googleapis.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('storjshare.io')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('supabase.co')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('temp.sh')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('transfer.sh')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('trycloudflare.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('ufile.io')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('w3spaces.com')) OR contains(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('workers.dev'))))

output.summary: Detects BITS transfer job downloading files from a file sharing domain.
